meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6038.

td.p: Kate Palladino, a middle school librarian from Lafayette Hill, Pennsylvania
Adam Bibler, an economist originally from Lancaster, Ohio
Josh Powell, a phone-based health coach from San Diego, California (whose 3-day cash winnings total $26,900)

tr.td: PRESIDENTIAL MAKEOVERS
NBA MVPs PDQ, OK?
STATE FAIRS
LITERATURE ALIASES
THIS CATEGORY IS A SHOE-IN
W.W. 5
